name: create-sea
description: Boilerplate for Node.js single executable applications

scripts.inject: cp $(which node) build/app && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && npx postject build/app NODE_SEA_BLOB build/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run bundle && npm run inject
